properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 3:17PM PST until January 9 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20 kt
and steep seas 10 to 12 ft. For the Gale Warning, northwest
winds 25 to 35 kt and steep seas 15 feet at 11 seconds expected.
For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 10 to 20 kt with and
seas 10 to 14 feet at 11 seconds expected. For the Hazardous
Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous seas 21 to 26 feet at 16
seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM PST
this evening. For the Gale Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM
PST Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 10 PM
PST Thursday. For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from late Friday
night through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
